projects.name: College Inquiry Chatbot
projects.description: Its my final year BCA college project, a web-based chatbot designed to assist students with college-related queries. It utilizes natural language processing to provide accurate and relevant information, making it easier for students to navigate their academic journey. The core challenge was ensuring the chatbot understood context and provided helpful responses.
features: It helps the student of Brijlal Biyani Science College
Maharashtra in day to day college related queries

projects.name: Rail Sarthi PNR Checker
projects.description: PNR checking web app integrated with Indian Railways APIs via OpenRouter.
features: Rail Sarthi is a PNR checking website that allows users to quickly and accurately check the status of their Indian Railway tickets. By simply entering a 10-digit PNR number
the site fetches real-time ticket confirmation details using official railway APIs. This ensures users receive up-to-date information about their travel status in a fast and reliable way

projects.name: PDF2Word - Word2PDF
projects.description: It converts word files to pdf and pdf files to word
features: File converter from PDF file to Word and vice versa

projects.name: Image Format Converter
features: The web converts images from one format to another and vice versa example jpg to png etcs
